title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: The Open Type dialog prominently displays obfuscated classes (such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd') from JDK 1.4.
EB: The Open Type dialog should not display obfuscated classes.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Open Type dialog.
2. Observe the list of displayed classes.

Options to resolve the bug:
- Sort lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.
- Filter out the obfuscated classes completely.

Suggested solution: Sort lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter.
